## IService.subscribe() method

Subscribe to changes in the service

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subscribe(fn: () => void): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | <code>() =&gt; void</code> | Callback function to be invoked when there is a change in the service |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

An ID to be used to unsubscribe
